title: Perplexity Campus Strategist Program 2024
meta_description: Lead growth and marketing on campus. Meet and learn from the Perplexity leadership team. Join other ambitious students passionate about AI and technology in shaping the future of knowledge.
main_content: Back ABOUT ME he/him Sudarshan Nambiar Purdue University LinkedIn Sudarshan Nambiar is a student at Purdue University studying Computer Engineering. He is a Neo scholars finalist and also a member of ML@Purdue. © 2024 PERPLEXITY AI, Inc. All rights reserved.
